description:
Dealing with dates and times is famously complicated. In this tutorial,
you'll work through a few common datetime-handling tasks and handle some
edge cases you are likely to encounter at some point in your career.

This tutorial will cover:

-  Working with time zones
-  Serializing and deserializing datetimes
-  Datetime arithmetic
-  Scheduling recurring events

The format will be a mix of short lectures and hands-on exercises.
title: Dealing with Datetimes
